issue.title: [C++] Add CI entry that builds without the conda-forge toolchain but with system packages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4733](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4733). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instead of using the conda-forge toolchain to provide parts of the dependencies but then compile with a system compiler, utilise the system packages to build and test the C++ implementation.
